name: Naxos (itch)
description:
"Oh, let me See
Into the many multitudes of broken hearts.
Jaded, tossed on high and troubled seas,
Cast against distant shores for their adroit machinations."

An island in the sea, and two souls inhabiting it, alone in their misery. Until fate or some such tawdry thing compels them from the darkness to seek each other out. 

An atmospheric mini visual novel about the monsters within and without us. 

Inspired by Greek mythology and classic Minoan art. 

Features 5 possible endings.
